Class FractionImpl

java.lang.Object
FractionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Fraction, Comparable<Fraction>
public class FractionImpl extends Object implements Fraction

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the fraction in the format "numerator/denominator". The fraction is simplified by dividing both the numerator and denominator by their greatest common divisor.
      Specified by:
